CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(Business_Unit_Score__c), IMAGE("/resource/CircleGrey", "",20,20), IF(Business_Unit_Score__c >= 35, IMAGE("/resource/Priority_4_Low", "",20,20), IF(Business_Unit_Score__c > 20 && Business_Unit_Score__c < 35, IMAGE("/resource/Priority_3_Medium","",20,20), IMAGE("/resource/Priority_2_High","",20,20) )))
CustomField.label: Business Unit Assessment
